an5.34:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an5.34:1.2: Atha kho siho senapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho siho senapati bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.34:1.3: “sakka nu kho, bhante, bhagava sanditthikam danaphalam pannapetun”ti?
an5.34:2.2: “dayako, siha, danapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manapo.
an5.34:2.3: Yampi, siha, dayako danapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manapo, idampi sanditthikam danaphalam.
an5.34:3.1: Puna caparam, siha, dayakam danapatim santo sappurisa bhajanti.
an5.34:3.2: Yampi, siha, dayakam danapatim santo sappurisa bhajanti, idampi sanditthikam danaphalam.
an5.34:4.1: Puna caparam, siha, dayakassa danapatino kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.34:4.2: Yampi, siha, dayakassa danapatino kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, idampi sanditthikam danaphalam.
an5.34:5.1: Puna caparam, siha, dayako danapati yam yadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam yadi brahmanaparisam yadi gahapatiparisam yadi samanaparisam—visarado upasankamati amankubhuto.
an5.34:5.2: Yampi, siha, dayako danapati yam yadeva parisam upasankamati—yadi khattiyaparisam yadi brahmanaparisam yadi gahapatiparisam yadi samanaparisam—visarado upasankamati amankubhuto, idampi sanditthikam danaphalam.
an5.34:6.1: Puna caparam, siha, dayako danapati kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
an5.34:6.2: Yampi, siha, dayako danapati kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati, idam samparayikam danaphalan”ti.
an5.34:7.1: Evam vutte, siho senapati bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.34:7.2: “yanimani, bhante, bhagavata cattari sanditthikani danaphalani akkhatani, naham ettha bhagavato saddhaya gacchami; aham petani janami.
an5.34:7.3: Aham, bhante, dayako danapati bahuno janassa piyo manapo.
an5.34:7.4: Aham, bhante, dayako danapati; mam santo sappurisa bhajanti.
an5.34:7.5: Aham, bhante, dayako danapati; mayham kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato: ‘siho senapati dayako karako sanghupatthako’ti.
an5.34:7.6: Aham, bhante, dayako danapati yam yadeva parisam upasankamami—yadi khattiyaparisam yadi brahmanaparisam yadi gahapatiparisam yadi samanaparisam—visarado upasankamami amankubhuto.
an5.34:7.7: Yanimani, bhante, bhagavata cattari sanditthikani danaphalani akkhatani, naham ettha bhagavato saddhaya gacchami; aham petani janami.
an5.34:7.8: Yanca kho mam, bhante, bhagava evamaha:
an5.34:7.9: ‘dayako, siha, danapati kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati’ti, etaham na janami; ettha ca panaham bhagavato saddhaya gacchami”ti.
an5.34:7.11: Dayako danapati kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjatiti.
